doc:
Jerry Adler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerry_Adler 0 Jerry Adler (born February 4, 1929) is an American theatre director, production supervisor, and a television and film actor. He is perhaps best known for his work as Herman "Hesh" Rabkin on The Sopranos and as Howard Lyman on The Good Wife. Jerry_Adler ( born February_4_,_1929 ) is an_American_theatre_director , production_supervisor , and a_television_and_film_actor . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_work as Herman_"_Hesh_"_Rabkin on The_Sopranos and as Howard_Lyman on The_Good_Wife .
